Description: Defines the mandatory structure for immutable indexing of system state commits ($\Psi_{N}$) to facilitate RRP triage and forensic analysis (TVCR linkage).

EpochID.description: The sequential Deterministic State Evolution ID ($\Psi_{N}$)

GSM_RootHash.description: The cryptographic root hash of the Governance State Manifest (GSM) for this epoch.

GSM_Pointer.description: Immutable storage location pointer for the GSM artifact.

TVCR_Link.description: Reference pointer to the corresponding Trace and Veto Context Registry (TVCR) instance recorded by SGS, if applicable.
